thread.title: Ivanka Trump Tweets About Protecting Houses of Worship in Response to Jewish Center Threats
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Tweets About Protecting Houses of Worship in Response to Jewish Center Threats

author: Josh Feldman
title: Ivanka Trump Tweets About Protecting Houses of Worship in Response to Jewish Center Threats
text:
Ivanka Trump Tweets About Protecting Houses of Worship in Response to Jewish Center Threats by Josh Feldman | 7:09   
Ivanka Trump has tweeted tonight in response to the threats that led to evacuations of multiple Jewish community centers across the country today : America is a nation built on the principle of religious tolerance. We must protect our houses of worship & religious centers. #JCC 
— Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 20, 2017 
The White House issued a statement on these threats earlier today: BREAKING: @PressSec responds to my request for comment about wave of threats to Jewish community centers. @NBCNews pic.twitter.com/2Yq9atnAmt 
— Peter Alexander (@PeterAlexander) February 20, 2017 
[ image via screengrab ]
